head.title: A Little Donghia for a Lot Less, At a Warehouse Sale at the Puck

hedline.hl1: A Little Donghia for a Lot Less, At a Warehouse Sale at the Puck

abstract.p: Donghia furniture warehouse sale noted; photo (Currents column) (S)

block.p: Donghia, which sells furniture and textiles to the trade, will have a warehouse sale March 29 through April 1 that is open to the public. The tub chair, right, will be $675; it was $2,250; Villa, a 95-inch-long wicker sofa, will be $1,875; it was $6,250. Venetian glass lamps will be $525, reduced from $1,750. Fabrics will be $10 to $25 a yard. At the Puck Building, 295 Lafayette Street; (800) 366-4442. Doors will open at 9 a.m., closing times vary.
